Consumed by rage, betrayed by life, now rests in peace the kingdoms tsar
death.attack.chesed_ba_attack: %s couldn't handle an army of robots
death.attack.chesed_falling_block: %s lost its head to a boulder
death.attack.chesed_falling_block.player: %s lost its head to a boulder
death.attack.chesed_lor_attack: %s was turned into a book by %s
death.attack.malkuth_hellshaper: %s was burnt to an icicle by IceOrFireBall
death.attack.malkuth_side_rocks: %s's face was smashed with a boulder
death.attack.malkuth_tsars_wrath: %s couldn't survive the wrath of fallen king
effect_description.fdbosses.chesed_energ:
Chesed ray attack deals 0 damage to targets that have this effect.

When that target is hit with ray attack reduce the effect level by 1. Remove the effect if ray reflector was also hit.

Players with this effect charge nearby ray reflectors.
effect_description.fdbosses.coward: When this effect expires immediately kills the owner
effect_description.fdbosses.shocked: Decreases outcoming damage by a set percentage.
effect_description.minecraft.night_visio:
Just a regular night vision.

Allows to see in the dark like its day.
fdbosses.bosses.description.chesed:
A creature born out of rocks corroded by sculk. Wields enormous magic power.

§cRecommended weapon type: {{(fdlib:item)item=minecraft:diamond_axe}}
fdbosses.bosses.description.malkuth:
The Qliphoth of Malkuth. Benevolent King who ruled over a once-prosperous land, whose blind, excessive generosity became his kingdoms demise.

§5Devs Note: Its better to fight him at night.§r
fdbosses.core_ability.fire_and_ice_core: Can be combined with items that has damage. Allows summoning Malkuth fireballs on item use.
fdbosses.core_ability.lightning_core: Can be combined with items that has damage. Gives an ability to summon Chesed lightnings on hit.
fdbosses.drops.chesed.fire_and_ice_core_:
The core of Malkuth.

Can be attached to any item that has damage to be able to summon Malkuth fireballs.

Use an item to release a fireball that will deal a percentage of item damage and ignite the targets.

Crouch while using an item to release an iceball that will slow the targets instead.

Damage:
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=itemConfig, value=playerMalkuthFireballToolDamagePercent}}% of tool damage.

Item ability cooldown:
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_duration}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=itemConfig, value=playerMalkuthFireballAbilityCooldown}} ticks
fdbosses.drops.chesed.lightning_core_des:
A core that Chesed draws its power from. 

Can be applied to any weapon in crafting table. 

When attacking entities with a weapon that is enhanced with Lightning Core there is a chance to struck the target with Chesed lightning that will do a percentage of weapons damage while inflicting {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:shocked}}.
fdbosses.drops.chesed.lightning_core_sta:
Shock:
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=effectConfig, value=shockDamageReductionPercent}}% outgoing damage reduction.
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_duration}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=itemConfig, value=lightningStrikeShockDuration}} ticks.

Lightning: 
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=itemConfig, value=lightningStrikeDamagePercent}}% of weapon damage.

Summon chance:  {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=itemConfig, value=chanceToSummonLightningStrike}}%
fdbosses.drops.chesed.trophy_description: A trophy of Chesed to showcase your heroic deeds
fdbosses.drops.malkuth.trophy_descriptio: A trophy of Malkuth to showcase your heroic deeds
fdbosses.skills.chesed.blocks_descriptio: Tears out blocks from the earth and hurls them onto target.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.crystals_descript:
Casts this ability before the lightning ray attack.

Destroys all crystals and then summons 1 crystal on each side of the battlefield.

If a crystal is destroyed by a player, that player becomes {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_energized,level=1}}.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.earthquake_descri:
Slams the earth emitting a shockwave and lightnings that travel out from Chesed position.

During second phase more lightnings are summoned and their movement speed is increased.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.electrified_air_d: Air above Chesed crackles with power. Entities that interact with it are damaged.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.electrified_air_s:
Air: 
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=chesedConfig, value=electrifiedAirCurrentHealthDamagePercent}}% current HP.

Instantly kills affected entity if HP is lower than  {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=chesedConfig, value=electrifiedAirInstadeathHP}}.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.espheres_descript:
Releases ball lightnings that travel out from Chesed.

These ball lightnings cannot be reflected.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.final_description:
Drains power from monoliths and then unleashes a lightning strike that damage everyone on the battlefield. 

Amount of damage depends on how many monoliths are in an active state. 

While Chesed casts this ability, monoliths are invulnerable. 

Deactivated monoliths become active again after this ability ends.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.final_stats:
Attack: 
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=chesedConfig, value=finalAttackDamagePercentPerMonolith}}% Max HP per active monolith.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.kinetic_field_des:
Uses this attack only on second phase.

Traps players in a kinetic field that doesn't allow them to escape.

Periodically summons lightnings in all kinetic fields.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.lightning_ray_des:
Casts Crystals ability before this ability and then begins to fire lightning rays with tremendous power at target. 

Lightning ray deals 0 damage to targets affected by {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_energized}}.

If a target is a charged ray reflector Chesed takes 1 damage.

During second phase the frequency of attacks is increased.

§lTip!§r

While charging the attack, Chesed tries to aim slightly beyond the target movement and stops aiming moments before releasing the lightning ray.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.mightiness_descri:
Chesed cannot be hurt directly and its arena cannot be easily escaped from.

All damage inflicted by Chesed cannot be lowered by any resistances.

Gives all combatants {{(fdbosses:effect)id=minecraft:night_vision}} while alive.

If a player looks away from Chesed, that player is inflicted with {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_gaze}}.

Chesed proceeds to second phase when hp drop below 50%.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.monoliths_descrip:
Spawns 4 monoliths when summoned. 

Monoliths deactivate upon death and cannot be damaged anymore.

Monoliths gain additional {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=chesedConfig, value=additionalSecondPhaseMonolithHP}} HP on second phase.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.rockfall_descript:
Fires lightning beam at the ceiling causing it to crumble while summoning lightnings around combatants. 

During second phase amount and frequency of lightnings are increased.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.roll_description:
Rolls around the arena damaging and pushing away everyone who step in its way. 

During second phase leaves a fire trail behind.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.arcslash_descrip:
Damage type: §cFire§r / §bIce§r

Malkuth charges up his swords and releases aerial slashes in arcs, covering the whole arena.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.armor_descriptio: Malkuth wields impenetrable armor, capable of neglecting any damage.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.cannons_descript:
Damage type: §cFire§r / §bIce§r

Malkuth jumps on the wall behind him and orders his cannons to fire devastating shots at the target.

When this ability is cast, combatants cannons can be used once again, unless they are broken.

§lSecond phase:§r

When second phase starts Malkuth orders his cannons to break cannons on combatants side.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.chainpunch_descr:
Damage type: §7Basic§r

Malkuth pulls every combatant, who were in the air, and punches them with overwhelming force.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.earthshatter_des:
Damage type: §7Basic§r

Malkuth leaps to the target and crushes the earth, hurling everyone who were caught in the attack into the air.

During the second phase, if there are broken cannons on the combatants side, spawns a special crystal at the attack location that is capable of repairing cannons.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.fair_duel_descri:
Combatants can use two cannons on their side to fight on equal ground with Malkuth.

Right click a cannon to fire a shot.

Combatants can only use the cannon of type they are currently weak to.

After firing a shot, cannon becomes unusable until the next use of Cannonade ability.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.fire_and_ice_des:
While on an arena combatants may be weak to §cFire§r or §bIce§r.

Current damage type you are weak to can be seen on the crosshair.

Malkuth abilities deal three types of damage:

1: §7Basic§r - regular damage type.

2: §cFire§r - makes targets weaker to §cFire§r damage, deals reduced damage to targets that are weak to §bIce§r.

3: §bIce§r - makes targets weaker to §bIce§r damage, deals reduced damage to targets that are weak to §cFire§r.

§lExample:§r

If target that is weak to §cFire§r receives §bIce§r damage, its amount is reduced and that target becomes weaker to §cFire§r.

If target that is weak to §cFire§r receives §cFire§r damage, its amount is not reduced and target becomes weaker to §cFire§r.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.hellshaper_descr:
Damage type: §cFire§r / §bIce§r

Malkuth slams the earth, summoning floating islands, hurling everyone in the air and rendering the floor impossible to walk on.

Launches fireballs at these islands thereafter.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.impaling_doom_de:
Damage type: §cFire§r / §bIce§r

Malkuth slams the earth, releasing either a §cFire§r or §bIce§r spikes that travel in the slam direction.

When colliding with combatants those spikes hurl them up into the air.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.knights_duty_des:
During the bossfight all combatants receive {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:knight}} .

When combatant escapes the arena before the fight ended {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:knight}} transforms into {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:coward}} .

Lava field is not a part of the arena!

When a combatant with {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:coward}} steps into arena once again, it changes back to {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:knight}}.

§oCowardness is not allowed! Death penalty!§r
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.side_rocks_descr:
Damage type: §cFire§r / §bIce§r

Malkuth tears up boulders from the earth, imbuing them with his magic and hurls them onto player.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.slash_descriptio:
Damage type: §cFire§r / §bIce§r

Charges one if his swords and releases an aerial slash traveling towards the target.

The damage type of the slash is based on the sword that was charged.

This slash is capable of slicing through crystals.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.tsars_wrath_desc:
Damage type: §cFire§r / §bIce§r

Malkuth summons two giant swords and orders them to slam the ground with devastating force.

§lSecond phase:§r

Also fires his cannons before the attack lands.
fdbosses.skills.malkuth.tsars_wrath_stat:
Sword:
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: Infinite

This attacks damage can be fully negated, despite the damage reduction value.
fdbosses.tldr.chesed:
Chesed damage pierces armor and shields.

To damage Chesed:

Wait until lightning ray attack, kill a crystal with an axe to get {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_energized,level=1}}, run to a ray reflector and make Chesed hit it. You are immune to lightning ray attack when you are {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_energized}}.

Chesed has an attack which damage depends on the amount of active monoliths, if all monoliths are active - there is no way to survive the attack. To deactivate a monolith - kill it.
fdbosses.tldr.malkuth:
Cannot be attacked directly.

When player is weak to §cFire§r it receives decreased §bIce§r damage, and other way around if player is weak to §bIce§r, it receives decreased §cFire§r damage.

Current weakness can be seen on the crosshair.

Use cannons on the arena to attack Malkuth, you can only use the cannon of type you are currently weak to.
fdbosses.word.boosty: Support mod development on Boosty (Shift+Click to see Boosters)
fdbosses.word.consequences: You will soon face the consequences of your own actions.
fdbosses.word.core_lose: WARNING: You cannot put two or more different cores on one item!
fdbosses.word.didnt_read_skills: It is highly advised to read boss skill descriptions before the fight. Do you really wish to start the fight now?
fdbosses.word.killed_chesed_in_screen: Well, you killed him. Congratulations! I hope you feel bad about yourself for killing an innocent creature! You know, i wanted to crash the game but that would be a bad game design, so i will leave that decision to you. Here, press that button.
fdbosses.word.not_updated: The data is not updated online yet. I will add new subscribers with subsequent updates.
fdbosses.word.patreon: Support mod development on Patreon (Shift+Click to see Patrons)
fdbosses.word.stop_it: Stop it. Bosses do have feelings too, you know.
fdbosses.word.tried_to_break_arena: An evil force prevents you from corrupting this place.
fdbosses.word.you_are_getting_on_my_nerv: You are starting to get on my nerves.
